Module it.polimi.ingsw
Package it.polimi.ingsw.santorini.model.gameoperations.expansion

Class ExpConsumer<T,​S>

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.santorini.model.gameoperations.expansion.Expandable<T,​S,​U,​SimpleExpandable<T,​S,​U>>
it.polimi.ingsw.santorini.model.gameoperations.expansion.SimpleExpandable<java.util.function.Consumer<T>,​S,​ConsumerExpansion<T,​S>>
it.polimi.ingsw.santorini.model.gameoperations.expansion.ExpConsumer<T,​S>
Type Parameters:
T - The Consumer's input type
S - The type of the supported expansions' marker
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.util.function.Consumer<T>
public class ExpConsumer<T,​S>
extends SimpleExpandable<java.util.function.Consumer<T>,​S,​ConsumerExpansion<T,​S>>
implements java.util.function.Consumer<T>
Brief Expandable Consumer, it represents a special Consumer that can be expanded with more consumers. It executes the expansions in the given order and not distinguishing them by ExpansionType
See Also:
Consumer, SimpleExpandable
